attributes.action: Let secondary school children go to the toilet during lesson!!
attributes.additional_details: Everyone needs to pee. Girls have periods. If you hold in your waste, you may see Hemorrhoids, Anal fissures, bladder / genital infection, general pain, and even your bladder bursting. Girls, with periods, will all know, that having to get a 'toilet pass' or a 'red pass' to be allowed to go to the toilet, is humiliating, and scary. My school has banned toilet passes for girls, unless they have a medical issue now. Please make every 11-16 year old happy, and heard, and let us go to the toilet.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for teachers to not let secondary school children to go to the toilet during lesson.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422

If you are concerned about your school's policy regarding access to toilets you should raise these with your parents or a teacher.
